Uses of Interface
model.Player

Packages that use Player
Package
Description
model
The model package contains the classes that define the logic and state of the Tic-Tac-Toe game (in progress, invalid move, win, tie).
view
The view package contains all the classes related to the display of the graphical user interface of the Tic-Tac-Toe game.

  • Uses of Player in model

    Classes in model that implement Player
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ComputerPlayer
    This class represents a computer player player in a Tic-Tac-Toe game and extends the UserPlayer class.
    class 
    UserPlayer
    This class represents a human player in a Tic-Tac-Toe game and implements the Player interface.
